venue.address_2: Off Mt Clinton Road beside the Highland Center at Pinkham Notch
venue.name: Crawford Path Connector

item.description:
We are hiking to 2 4000 Footers - Mounts Eisenhower & Pierce! Diane's group will meet at the Crawford Connector lot, across from the Highland Center on Mt Clinton Road, I-95 to exit 35, right on to Rte 3 North, right on to Rte 302. The Mt Clinton Road is 8.2 miles east on your left. The AMC Highland Center is .2 mile nearby. Take the first left (just before the gate) and park in the large lot. We will drive a few cars to the Edmund Path lot, then gear up for a 9 am start on Edmund Path. These trails have great footing with gentle elevation gain.


Itinerary:
Our group will hike up on the easy side of moderate 3.6 miles of Edmands Path to Mt Eisenhower (4760' on the 48 list). There are astounding 360 degree views from this treeless peak! After we eat lunch, rest, take pix, we'll continue 1.4 miles on the relatively flat ridge within tree line to bag Mt Pierce (4312') This mountain was formally known as Mt Clinton. We'll rest,and feed the greyjays, before descending 3.1 miles on Crawford Path, the oldest (1840) maintained footpath and bridle path in the Whites to our waiting cars.



Notes:
This is a moderately strenuous hike at a moderate pace with fantastic 360 degree views and over 2 miles of time spent above tree line, The round trip loop hike is 8.1 miles, with 3,100 feet of elevation gain, and a book time of 7 hours.

Where:
Crawford Path Connector
Off Mt Clinton Road beside the Highland Center at Pinkham Notch
Bretton Woods, NH 03575

Carpool from Tilton at 7 AM. please email me of you want to meet.
item.name: Hike Mounts Eisenhower & Pierce this Sunday
